      • load

        public void load()
        load CVars from file and overwrite engine cvars. You must register the cvars first.
        Since:
        v1.4.2

        saves the cvars with the flag to file

        saves CVars to file

      • getSuggestions

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getSuggestions(java.lang.String prefix)
        Good use is auto-complete suggestions.
        Parameters:
        prefix - some chars with which the cvar begins.
        Returns:
        A list containing every cvar starting with the prefix

      • register

        public void register(CVar cvar,
                     java.lang.String name,
                     CVar.CVarFlags flag)
        Registering should only be done by the game or the engine in init phase. Also saves as defaultValue. if already registered updates the default and current value.
        Parameters:
        cvar -
        name -
        flag -
        Since:
        v1.4.2
